definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Feet clattering, black tights, skirts just short of sin.
sentences.chinese: 嘈雜的腳步聲，黑色的緊身衣，造孽的短裙。

sentences.english: Well, I must confess, these are scruples.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我已經必須承認，這些都是造孽錢。

sentences.english: The gifts of the earth were put only to nefarious uses.
sentences.chinese: 大地的賜予全被用去造孽。

sentences.english: People, ah, commit a sin too many, why throw the dogs also do all of the charges?
sentences.chinese: 人啊，造孽太多，幹嘛還把所有的罪名扔給狗狗呢？

definition: to be born under an ill star
disaster one brings on oneself/to be reponsible for something bad that happens to oneself/to have only oneself to blame
to be lacking in moral sense/to lack common basic respect for others/lacking in virtue/mischievous/wicked/cruel/mean
to endure/to suffer/hardships/torments/a hard time/a nuisance
to reap what one has sown (idiom)/to stew in one's own juice
to harm sb/to inflict suffering/to victimize/pernicious
